name: vite-plugin-auto-origin
description: Vite plugin that configures origin url for dev server automatically
author: Simon Praetorius

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -b ./tsconfig.cjs.json ./tsconfig.esm.json && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > dist/cjs/package.json
scripts.test:distribution: npm run test:distribution:cjs && npm run test:distribution:esm && npm run test:distribution:ts
scripts.test:distribution:cjs: cd tests/javascript-cjs/ && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test:distribution:esm: cd tests/javascript-esm/ && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test:distribution:ts: cd tests/typescript/ && npm install && npm run build && npm run typecheck
